verses.roman:
madhyāhna kariyā prabhu gelā bhikṣā karibāre
sanātane lañā gelā tapana-miśrera ghare

synonyms: madhyāhna kariyā—finishing bathing at noon; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gelā—went; bhikṣā karibāre—to accept lunch; sanātane—Sanātana Gosvāmī; lañā—taking; gelā—went; tapana-miśrera ghare—to the house of Tapana Miśra.
translation: After bathing at noon, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to the house of Tapana Miśra for lunch. He took Sanātana Gosvāmī with Him.
